Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui

GUI base classes
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    DragNDrop
    This class contains method to enable drag and drop features in certain parts of the GUI
    GameLog
    This singleton class handles the GUI log, a TextFlow that shows regular updates during the game
    GUI
    The main class of the GUI
    GUIHelper
    Singleton class containing GUI-specific methods and variables.
    GUIMessageHandler
    Singleton class containing the GUI-specific methods for handling the server messages.
    GUISizes
    Contains all the relevant sizes that need to be accessed from the GUI
    LeaderCardSelection
    This class helps the setup phase of the game in the GUI, by associating the card to its image
    Modify
    Static helper class that can modify ImageViews at runtime and make them selectable
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    CurrAction
    Contains a simplified set of game actions
    LogUpdates
    Contains updates to trigger specific messages from the GameLog class
    ProductionState
    Enumeration to keep track of the current state of productions on the board
